scripts.build: rimraf build && react-scripts build && npm run icon
scripts.deploy-master: npm run test && npm run build && npm run firebase-deploy-master
scripts.deploy-dev: npm run test && npm run build && npm run firebase-deploy-dev
scripts.firebase-deploy-master: firebase use tomato-hours && firebase deploy -m "Branch master" --only hosting
scripts.firebase-deploy-dev: firebase use tomato-hours-beta && firebase deploy -m "Branch dev" --only hosting
scripts.deploy-ci-master: firebase use tomato-hours && firebase deploy -m "Branch $CIRCLE_BRANCH, build $CIRCLE_SHA1" --only hosting --non-interactive --token=$FIREBASE_DEPLOY_KEY
scripts.deploy-ci-dev: firebase use tomato-hours-beta && firebase deploy -m "Branch $CIRCLE_BRANCH, build $CIRCLE_SHA1" --only hosting --non-interactive --token=$FIREBASE_DEPLOY_KEY_BETA
